post.body: - Did you know she got a driver's license when she was here with us? It's much easier to get around if you drive!
- Well, the borg have only one goal... to assimilate, so that makes sense. btw - you didn't answer which bra you require
- Your profile says you're in Canada... me too. I wouldn't play road hockey but am dumb enough to deliver papers with my kid...
- No, I didn't click it... good thing... it was the scam.
- Uh oh... I'm older than you so I guess that makes me an old hen. ;-)
- Good plan! DaddyP would recommend I twitter as the Wicked Witch of the West, but I agree, someone alive is better...
- Where in Canada are you?
- I think the only real 'celebrity' on here is Obama. I'm going to need therapy or something now...
- I never look for people from high school, so I don't find them. ;-)
- I had hoped to find him for 70steen, but no luck. You'd think he'd know better!
- Maybe your laundry is just missing its chastity belt?
- you know that's not gonna hold up. I think if you braid a bounce sheet you have a better chance of staying laundry-free
Cinnamon buns calling... dough ready!
My goal is to out-twitter Olga the Traveling Bra...
DaddyP has to be cheap, his secretary won't give back his credit cards.
Must be domestic now, there's a breadmaker calling my name.
Currently... sticking pins into a little doll ( http://fraccers.com/ ) that represents all the phishers and scammers out there....
Just received that phishing scam thing. It says it came from sylvied, but I know she didn't send it... don't click on any links in DM's...
Worse... the Johnny Depp on Twitter isn't even the real Johnny Depp!
Donny Osmond does not twitter.
